cn.artistName: Guangzhou Fenglin Information Technology Co., Ltd.
cn.trackName: 传奇1.76官方正版盛大首发(重置版)今日开服送点卡迷失传说
cn.sellerName: Guangzhou Fenglin Information Technology Co., Ltd.
cn.releaseNotes: 修复已知bug，提升玩家游戏体验
cn.description:
十年不忘初心，官方正版经典再升级！
原版复刻端游，好玩又保值，永不关服！
布拉格公会强势回归，兄弟我在正版传奇等你！


2024官方正版传奇今日盛大首发！原版PC游戏内容1:1复刻重制，经典全职业-道法战回归。多系统复古玩法，游戏中多种复古写实场景可供玩家随意切换，多种酷炫魔幻的守护装备可在怪物中爆落。自由打金兄弟齐聚，燃情沙城争霸！

【游戏玩法】
— PK爆装 跨服竞技
自由PK，蛮荒古城，跨服争霸，多人竞技，与其他服抢夺资源，争夺BOSS！
杀人爆装、野外红名、镖车护送、领地争夺、激情攻沙丰富的PvP玩法！
— 轻松挂机 装备保值 
护肝玩法，轻松挂机升级，等级永不落后！
装备道具直接掉落，稀世装备永久保值！
— 自由交易 散人天堂
超激情打宝神器，爆极品装备、绚丽法阵高级技能刷怪！
装备保值自由交易，打造散人天堂！
— 新增玩法 激爽一夏
卧龙山庄勇闯天关，BOSS悬赏皇陵秘境，刀刀屠龙刀刀切割！

【特色系统】
— 副本系统：
全新副本，重磅来袭，等着玩家去探索和体验，和兄弟一起并肩作战吧！
— 装备系统：
装备可通过洗练获得随机属性；武器、衣服、项链、勋章、手镯、戒指、腰带、鞋子、玉佩、疗伤石等装备可通过镶嵌宝石提升装备属性。装备阶数：沃玛、祖玛、赤月、雷霆、战神、火龙、通云、金牛、主宰、传奇、热血、真龙、神龙、GM系列，可通过镶嵌宝石提高属性。
— 转生系统：
自由转生，转生神翼，万人膜拜，可增加角色生命值和攻击穿戴更高等级装备进入更高等级地图。
— 法觉系统：
炫酷法阵必不可少，增强法阵属性，轻松过渡前中期，法阵专属外观，让你在万人面前闪闪发光。
— 封号系统：
消耗功勋可提升封号等级，升级后可获得大量属性加成和封号称号显示。

cn.releaseNotes:
New! Local Data Health feature in Settings > Storage
Fixes for Object validation in Observations and Observing Lists
Open Cluster radial velocity fixed
cn.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===
===中国地区正式回归===

这是游戏创作者继获奖作品Kingdom Rush（王国保卫战）三部曲之后的又一超凡太空奇幻历险之作。即时，动态以及深度策略的游戏模式将带你穿越到不可思议的未知星球。沉浸式拟真游戏场景，过瘾的游戏玩法，以及超凡绝佳的艺术感和一丝诙谐幽默感带你进入激烈的战争世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的机甲人和强大的外星人通通等你来统率，并肩迎接最强挑战。

招募和训练银河系中最伟大的英雄，率领他们参与几乎不可能完成的危险任务，发动他们强大的力量和能力。即使是在战斗最激烈的时候你也可通过改变自己部队的角色而进行战略调整，突击队员调整为狙击兵，火焰喷射器调整为导弹发射器。通过炸弹袭击，智能地雷，支援部队，砲塔和各种特种武器转变战斗态势。

机器人军队整装待发;星际战舰坠毁了;到处是巨大怪物，未知的种族;所向披靡的攻击;绝望的营救;无所畏惧地破坏行动正在银河之中发生......银河系需要你的统领。

银河系需要钢铁战队

***游戏特色***

-指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。准备好发动英勇的攻击，坚守阵地，拯救平民，潜入超级计算机和各种英雄的物品。每个任务需要新的战术和行动才能取得胜利。

-通过17次终结式特别行动的战术规则测试你的机智。每个关卡通过伤痕铭记挑战。谅你也不敢。

-解锁不可能模式。仅对大无畏敢死队开放。谅你绝对不敢。

-在史诗战斗中击败巨大而非凡的头目。这些头目卑鄙而异常地巨大，他们决心要将你碾碎。钢铁战队，整装待发！

-40+升级以提升你的战略，同时授予你的部队防御无人机，凝固汽油弹火箭，反弹爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

-14位具有出色能力的英雄听从你的调遣。将他们训练到极致出色，否则惹恼他们后果自负。

-8种可向敌人发动进攻的特种武器，让你的战术更加具有深度。还有什么比得上一个瞄准了的导弹？对50枚高爆炸炸弹的轨道炮袭击！

-完成70+成就中的任何成就，赢得你应得的奖励。

选择你的游戏困难模式，找到属于你的公平挑战：休闲，普通或老兵，你自己决定！！

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的医药或医疗信息
偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
《避难所：生存》是一款核辐射下的末日生存游戏。在游戏中你将扮演主人公泰德，需要在被核弹袭击的前60秒，合理储备你的物资，营救你的家人至避难所。在游戏中你需要做出一些困难的决定，例如合理分配食物和处理变异蟑螂的袭击等等。

在游戏中你可以坚持多少天？每个人是否都能活下来？当食物耗尽时，又该何去何从？要知道无论你捡到什么，无论你救了谁，都将对你的生存起到至关重要的作用。在游戏中每一个生存故事都是不同的，每天都会有出乎意料的事情发生，所以你需要定量配给食物和水，充分利用你的供给，甚至冒险进入荒地...话不多说，祝你好运！

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.releaseNotes:
在这个全新的独家战役中将那些讨厌的海盗沉入海底！

- 畅玩 5 个新阶段：掠夺海盗王的岛屿，获取隐藏的宝藏。
- 新敌人：让海盗、海盗、鹦鹉、厚脸皮的猴子等等走上木板！
- BOSS 战斗：为 5 位“海贼王”准备炮弹，其中包括一位熟悉的面孔。
- 新英雄：认识卢塞尔纳，幽灵船船长，拥有幽灵般的力量和惊人的火力！
- 新塔：食人魔沉船，一艘由卑鄙的战争贩子指挥的失事船
- 新成就：如果没有美味的宝藏，海盗冒险还算什么？ 
- 复活节彩蛋丰富：即使在深处也有笑话！
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===
===中国地区正式回归===

战无不胜的巫师维兹南再度登场！踏上这场史诗之旅，组建军队，履行他那阴险的计划吧……哇哈哈。做好准备，让王国境内的臣民见识见识谁才是真正的老大！你将一路浴血奋战，征服新旧疆土，迎战各大帝国的劲敌，与强悍绝伦的BOSS们展开死斗——一切尽在这款充满幽默与史诗感的经典塔防游戏！

游戏特色

- 新增22种防御塔，每种都自带独一无二的特殊能力。
- 你可以随心所欲挑选防御塔，打造出最具杀伤力的组合，阻拦敌人进军的步伐！
- 42道挑战关卡，遍布三座大陆， 只等你来征服！
- 17位骁勇善战的英雄任你发号施令，绝无一丝犹豫。
- 超过60种强力敌人，让你绞尽脑汁，调动一切战术才能克敌制胜。
- 在传奇般的BOSS战中打倒7位不可一世的敌人，保卫你的王国！
- 新能力、新援军，帮你力克强敌。
- 10多种饰品和器具，让你再多几成胜算。
- 30种升级选择，让你的军队将潜力发挥得淋漓尽致。
- 60多种成就、隐藏秘密和好玩的东西等你来探索！
- 黑暗塔里没 Wi-Fi？别担心，离线玩就好！

维兹南领主的最新动态：
https://www.kingdomrushvengeance.com/

使用条款：
https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService

隐私政策：
https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy
经典迷宫游戏是一款经典的益智游戏，非常适合在短暂休息时训练您的大脑。它设计为一​​款非常简单的单人游戏，通过滑过有趣的复古迷宫来玩。快速玩一局，挑战 500 个迷宫，成为迷宫之王。

《冰钓大师》是一款终极冰上钓鱼游戏，融合沙盒元素，让玩家体检冬季垂钓的乐趣。稀有的垂钓目标、栩栩如生的画面、逼真的物理机制、鱼类行为系统、广泛的渔具选择、不同游戏模式的单人和多人游戏、全世界各个不同地点、不断变化的季节、时间和天气条件，共同打造成这一款终极冰钓模拟游戏。鱼类挣扎、钓鱼地点、世界各地的物种等，这些都是其他冰钓游戏没有的功能，也是它们让这款游戏成为独一无二的钓鱼游戏。

游戏功能：
-单人模式
-32 种鱼
-21 个开放世界地图
-18 种竞争模式
-18 场锦标赛
-鱼类挣扎
-大量的数值统计
-角色自定义
-抖杆，通过抖杆来引诱鱼吞饵
-变化的天气和时间
-季节变化（秋季、冬季、春季）
-鱼类行为引擎。控制每个鱼类的人工智能和集群智能系统
-渔具，学习并掌握使用数十种鱼钩、鱼竿、钻头、鱼饵和鱼饵

道具描述：
在这款游戏里，玩家可以在美丽的开放世界地图中随意漫游，在不同的环境中探索河流、池塘和湖泊。敢于深入人迹罕至的野外，找到最大的渔获。
通过学习每个地点的深度地图和冰层底部拓扑结构来找到最好的垂钓点，这是一件很有趣的事情，但需要耐心和专注。钓鱼者最大的期待莫过于，在每一片湖泊找到最佳钓鱼点或者掉到最大的鱼。当把钓鱼线投入水中，等到鱼上钩时，真正激动人心的时刻就开始了！相比掌握位置，在正确的环境里使用正确的装备也同样重要。真实的鱼类行为系统，将近30种鱼的人工智能和集群智能系统让这款游戏成为高度模拟的钓鱼体验。玩家可以选择各种不同的鱼钩、鱼竿、钻头和鱼饵。对付不同鱼类的完美渔具组合取决于季节，天气和白天的环境尤为重要。在《冰钓大师》中，以正确的方式和深度控制水中的鱼竿和鱼钩本身就是一项技能。鱼竿和鱼钩的物理机制确保鱼类会对玩家的行为做出真实的反应： 一方面，独自垂钓没有时间限制，也没有竞争对手，玩家可以在家舒适地练习你的钓鱼技能，不失为不错的休闲方式；另一方面，漫长的锦标赛和自定义程度极高的单项比赛会考验玩家的技能和知识，但玩家会得到全新装备和无限荣誉作为奖励。

cn.releaseNotes:
了庆祝模拟地铁诞生10周年，我们推出了模拟地铁的周年更新！
这次更新将有三个新地图以及其他令人兴奋的功能!

• 玩家们将能够探索像东京、华沙和里斯本这样标志性的模拟公路地图。
• 铺设丰富多彩的地铁系统来保持城市的运行。
• 模拟地铁新增了照片相框和新的GIF捕捉模式。
• 玩家可以导出他们不断扩展的地铁网络的动画，并与朋友们分享。
cn.description:
无与伦比的地铁模拟游戏《模拟地铁》现已登陆 iPhone 和 iPad。

• 入选 App Store 2016 年度最佳游戏
• 30 多个国家/地区的年度 Mac 游戏
• 英国电影电视艺术学院奖提名
• 荣获独立游戏节大奖
• IGN 年度移动游戏提名
• 入选 Gamespot 2016 年度最佳移动游戏

《模拟地铁》是一款为迅速发展城市而设计的地铁路线图游戏。连接各个站点之间的路线，开始运营列车。开放新站点时，透过重新规划使地铁路线保持高效运营。做决策，充分利用有限资源。你能使这座城市持续前进多久呢？

• 随机的城市发展规模，因此每个游戏均独一无二。
• 20座真实的城市，考验你的规划技能。
• 各种升级道具，有效调整铁路网路。
• 在普通模式中快速得分，在无限模式中放松，或在极限模式中面对终极挑战。
• 每天在每日挑战中与全球玩家一较高下。
• 提供夜间模式和色盲模式。
• 由 Disasterpeace （FEZ配乐师！）亲自操刀的自动配乐程序。

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
从寒冷的城堡冻原，乘坐疾驰的火车穿过沙漠，直至最后的边界。 全力以赴从各种生存条件艰辛密室中逃脱出来。探索各具风格的密室，密室建有多层地板、屋顶、通风口和地下隧道。开发你的创造力，使用各种日用品（肥皂和袜子）或一些有趣的随手可见的餐具等物品（叉子或钢板）制造武器和工具。

【游戏玩法】：
-顶级特色密室：
全力以赴从世界上生存环境最艰苦的密室中逃脱出来。你需要遵守密室的规定，做各种工作并遵循严格的日常安排；所有的一切都是在努力为你争取自由，早日逃出密室！

-建立你的装扮：
从大量的定制中选择你的角色，使其独一无二。当你策划逃脱时，时尚装扮很重要。

-制定你的逃脱计划：
在监狱里，你要开发你的创造力，使用有限的工具来制作各种道具。你可以将日常用品（如肥皂和袜子）组合起来，制造新的武器和工具，以帮助你实现目标。也可以从自助餐厅拿到叉子，在房间里铺一条隧道，并通过杂志和胶带制作海报以隐藏痕迹。你将很快了解到，胶带解决一切！

-逃脱队组合：
联合最多 3 个朋友组建终极逃脱团队，并设计出最疯狂的逃脱计划！聚拢于沙发上，为你的暗中冒险做准备。通过合作，你将创建更加精细和勇敢的计划。感觉没有竞争性？你可以进入对战模式，并显示出你有能力比你的朋友更快地逃脱任何密室。如果其他一切都失败了，在密室天井上解决你的敌对目标！

-准备战斗：
《逃脱者：困境突围》引入了全新的战斗系统，使每个密室的战斗更加激动人心以及具有互动性。你可以保持攻击姿态并围绕你的目标走动，以在作战中获得上风；也可以在合适的时间格挡已减少伤害。确保你先到健身房锻炼肌肉！

-逃脱新方法：
随着密室越来越艰苦，你将不得不策划更加周密的逃脱计划。应对任何密室逃脱都有很多选择。尝试制作药物混合物来伪造自己的死亡，让太平间做剩下的工作！

【游戏特色】：
-最多4名玩家合作逃脱
-玩家之间可以联机对战
-超过 300 个角色装扮定制
-多层密室，给你最真实的场景体验

**********************
【逃脱者：困境突围】
------联系我们------
有任何问题或建议，都可以通过以下渠道告诉我们：
客服电话：4009001565
客服邮箱：kf@east2west.cn
微信公众号：east2westgames或搜索“东品西尚”
微博：@东品游戏

阿丽娜和弗莱德特这对好朋友落入了一座座生机勃勃的梦幻岛屿花园，花园里到处都是他们童年时用过的日常物品。他们携手踏上一段的情感之旅，审视友谊的意义：他们共同创造的回忆，必须舍弃的东西，还有永远不该遗忘的事物。

这对朋友迷失在一个可以塑造因果的神秘领域，发现时间能在各个方向流动。操控时间来解决谜题并到达每座小岛的顶峰。跟随两人一起揭开和探索他们共同度过的重要时光，点亮一个个星座，照亮苦乐参半的故事线索。

获奖剧情
• 充满活力，受故事启发的艺术风格。
• 关于冒险、友谊和成长的梦幻故事。
• 具有个人故事的华丽单人游戏体验。
• 精心设计的谜题需要掌控好时间才能解开。
• 探索二十多个神秘的超现实花园岛屿。
• 在手机上畅享主机游戏画质。

量身打造
• 随时随地离线游玩。
• 不中断。无广告。无应用程式内支付。
• 无障碍设计；简单控制，无文字、语音、时间压力或复杂UI。
• 由特色艺术家Tim Shiel打造的舒缓背景配乐。
• 支援横向宽屏游玩或高大纵向视图。
• 寻找和完成十七项成就。

cn.releaseNotes:
Questions updated in line with DVSA’s latest Theory Test content, including new questions on Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS). 



The Official DVSA Guide to Driving—the essential skills publication updated, including a new section on ADAS and rewritten section on First aid on the road. 



Functional enhancements and bug fixes.
cn.description:
The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) are the people who set the tests and this app is by their official publisher, The Stationery Office (TSO). It’s regularly updated and covers everything you need to know to pass your theory test, drive safely and improve your road safety awareness! 

Our app is for CAR DRIVERS in Great Britain and Northern Ireland. 

This app can be used offline so that you can practise anytime and anywhere. 

KEY HIGHLIGHTS
• Over 770+  practice theory questions.
• Custom mock tests.
• 36 interactive CGI hazard perception clips.
• Free access to The Highway Code.
• Exclusive access to one of the 3 source materials for the theory test: ‘The Official DVSA Guide to Driving – the essential skills’ (additional purchase required).
• Progress tracking.
• Advanced search tool.
• Voiceover features.

TEST YOURSELF
• Take unlimited quick and timed mock tests. Build a custom practice set or take a timed mock test with 50 questions – just like the real thing. 
• Your progress will also be monitored and visualised in graphs, so you can see how far you’ve come and when you are ready to pass.

STUDY AND PRACTISE
• Read the exclusive study content to increase your knowledge of all theory test topics and test your understanding by answering practice questions (including all official questions, over 770+!).
• You can also select specific question sets from areas you may be struggling with. Got a question wrong? See the correct answer, note the explanation and find out more with references to The Highway Code and other official DVSA guides!

VIDEO CASE STUDIES
• 9 bonus case studies so that you can practise multiple choice questions about a short video clip. 

PROGRESS GAUGE
• Backed by learning science, use the progress gauge to measure your test readiness, providing you with confidence that you’re ready to pass your theory test. 

THE HIGHWAY CODE
• To support your study, we’ve included a free copy of The Official Highway Code to revise from.

EXCLUSIVE CONTENT
• This is the only app to offer ‘The Official DVSA Guide to Driving – the essential skills’, one of the 3 key source materials that the multiple choice questions in the theory test are based on. Study these to learn the rules and skills you’ll be tested on (additional purchase required). 

SEARCH FEATURE
• Do you want to learn about airbags, stopping distances, or yellow lines, or practise questions on road markings? Use our advanced search tool to find the content you need.

ENGLISH VOICEOVER
• If you have reading difficulties (such as dyslexia), or prefer to learn by listening, use our voiceover feature within the test section to support you. 

USEFUL LINKS AND SUPPLIER ZONE
• Navigate through useful resources to support your learning, including the Safe Driving for Life website – a one-stop information resource featuring helpful blogs with lots of tips to help you pass. 
• Passed your test? Use our supplier zone to help you with the next steps in your driving journey. 
• Ready to Pass? links to DVSA’s official resources to help you understand what it takes to be ready for your driving test. Give yourself the best possible chance of passing by learning vital skills, managing your nerves and taking mock tests. 

FEEDBACK
• Let us know what you’d like to see. We’d love to hear from you with any comments or suggestions about this app. 

AWARDS AND RECOGNITION
• Produced by the official publishers of DVSA (TSO).
• Over 4+ million downloads.
• Featured on Apple’s Top Education Apps.
• Nominated for App of the Year (FirstCar).

SUPPORT
• Contact our UK-based team at feedback@williamslea.com  or +44 (0)333 202 5070. We listen and respond to your feedback by updating the app and adding new features.

cn.description:
经典三国单机版

《逐鹿》是一款基于同名历史沙盘游戏引擎开发而成的三国题材回合制策略游戏。在硝烟四起、诸侯争霸的三国乱世中，玩家可以在剧本中任意选择势力，饰演主公。通过内政、外交等玩法助你运筹帷幄。带领麾下群雄，攻城略地，在辽阔的战场上开疆扩土。或兴复汉室，或成一代枭雄，皆掌握在你的手中。

问鼎九州，逐鹿三国

《逐鹿》的历史剧本以《三国演义》为蓝本推演而来，游戏贯穿历史典故，力求还原三国时期的史实风貌。玩家可以任意挑选剧本，并饰演其中一势力的主公，谋定三国，一统九州。

山河为子，天下为局

《逐鹿》以经典六角战棋玩法为核心战斗模式，玩家可以指挥部队以“六角战棋”的形式纵横驰骋于大战场之上，或与敌人短兵相接，或以计谋决胜千里之外，在矢石之间，开疆扩土。

坚甲利兵，攻无不克

在游戏中兵种可分为步兵、骑兵、机械三大类，细分则有弓兵、弩兵、盾兵、轻骑兵等十余种。还有数十种专属兵种可以携带，出征时根据战况调配兵种阵容，能够达到先发制人，克敌机先的效果。

鸾翔凤集，龙幡虎纛

根据历史文献记载以及结合三国演义内容，目前游戏中已设计武将有600余名。每个武将具有独特的特性，可以凸显武将的差异化。不仅如此，我们还为历史名将绘制了精致的专属立绘，彰显其个性。

cn.description:
在战场上，谁说只有手柄才能成为武器？  
DaDaDaDa - 空气枪带来了前所未有的互动体验！通过手机和手表，你能变身为枪械大师，体验逼真的体感射击。想象一下，你和朋友一起拿着手机模拟空气手枪，佩戴手表模拟机枪发射 “DaDaDaDa”的声音，火力全开！震动反馈增强了每一次射击的真实感，每次 “BiuBiuBiu”的枪声让你瞬间沉浸在游戏世界中。而不同的枪械带来的独特声音，像“PewPewPew”的M14步枪，给你一种独特的战斗体验。

为什么DaDaDaDa更好玩？

DaDaDaDa - 空气枪不仅仅是一个普通的射击游戏。它将手机、手表与真实的枪械体验融合，每个动作都被精准捕捉，带来身临其境的游戏感受。每当你点击开枪时，“DaDaDaDa”的声音便会响起，强劲的火力让你感受到震撼。而当你换上空气手枪，则会听到“BiuBiuBiu”的轻巧射击声，细腻的音效让每一场战斗都不单调。不同枪械带来的独特声音体验，将为你创造一个多样化的游戏世界。

DaDaDaDa的优势之处

1. 震动反馈：每个枪支的火力不同，震动反馈也不同。选择一把强力的机枪，如加特林，体验来自“DaDaDaDa”射击的强烈震动感。你可以感受到像“BiuBiuBiu”的沙漠之鹰的精准射击，或者体验“PewPewPew”的M14步枪带来的稳定射击感，每种枪支都有它独特的魅力。
    
2. 真实的换弹动作：每次换弹时，你都会听到真实的换弹音效，同时模仿真实的换弹动作。这种互动体验让你完全沉浸在游戏中，仿佛你正在执行一项重要的战斗任务，而不是单纯的游戏。
    
3. 手表与手机同步/独立运行：无论你是一个人玩，还是和朋友一起，手表和手机都能独立运行，甚至一个人可以持双枪，玩转不同的枪支。你可以在激烈的战斗中切换沙漠之鹰、AK47、加特林、甚至M14步枪，每种武器带来不同的声音和手感。比如在你手上，手机发出“DaDaDaDa”的狂暴机枪声，而手表则模拟“BiuBiuBiu”的精准手枪射击声，每种武器都有各自的独特魅力。
    
4. 适合多人互动：不论是和朋友、家人，还是情侣一同分享这款游戏，DaDaDaDa都能让你和他们一起感受竞技和合作的乐趣。想象一下，和你的朋友在家里进行一场“DaDaDaDa”与“BiuBiuBiu”的对决，或者和孩子们一起体验“PewPewPew”的M14步枪，仿佛置身于一个充满挑战的射击场景中。
    

DaDaDaDa自己怎么玩？和朋友怎么玩？

1. 自己玩  
    如果你自己玩时，你可以戴上手表、手持手机，模拟多种枪械的射击。“DaDaDaDa”的机枪扫射声，或者“BiuBiuBiu”的手枪精准射击声，每种声音都能带给你不同的体验。在你换上空气枪的同时，手表和手机的震动反馈也在提醒你，战斗正愈发激烈。
    
2. 和朋友一起玩  
    和朋友一起玩时，你们可以手持手机和手表，互相对战或者合作。使用不同的枪支，你将听到不同的枪声，“DaDaDaDa”的狂暴机枪声，“BiuBiuBiu”的轻盈手枪声，甚至是“PewPewPew”的M14步枪的精准射击声，每种武器都有各自的魅力。
    
3. 与家人或情侣玩  
    和家人或情侣一起玩时，你们不仅能享受亲密的互动，还能通过游戏加深彼此的感情。想象一下，你和你的伴侣或孩子站在一起，使用“DaDaDaDa”的加特林机枪或者“BiuBiuBiu”的沙漠之鹰模拟射击，一起进行友好的竞技和合作。
    

你不应该错过DaDaDaDa

DaDaDaDa - 空气枪不仅仅是一款射击游戏，它还是一次身临其境的冒险。每一次“DaDaDaDa”的枪声、每一次“BiuBiuBiu”的射击和“PewPewPew”的M14步枪声，都让你无法停下手中的动作，仿佛成为了战场上的英雄。无论你是独自挑战，还是和朋友、家人一起对战，DaDaDaDa都能带给你不一样的乐趣。

我们非常希望听到您的声音！

hk.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action roguelite bullet hell inspired by The Binding Of Isaac and Tiny Rogues, where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 100 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with over 10 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 10+ unique characters!​

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over a hundred unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!​

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villian to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours!

Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

hk.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

hk.releaseNotes:
Questions updated in line with DVSA’s latest Theory Test content, including new questions on Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS). 



The Official DVSA Guide to Driving—the essential skills publication updated, including a new section on ADAS and rewritten section on First aid on the road. 



Functional enhancements and bug fixes.
hk.description:
The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) are the people who set the tests and this app is by their official publisher, The Stationery Office (TSO). It’s regularly updated and covers everything you need to know to pass your theory test, drive safely and improve your road safety awareness! 

Our app is for CAR DRIVERS in Great Britain and Northern Ireland. 

This app can be used offline so that you can practise anytime and anywhere. 

KEY HIGHLIGHTS
• Over 770+  practice theory questions.
• Custom mock tests.
• 36 interactive CGI hazard perception clips.
• Free access to The Highway Code.
• Exclusive access to one of the 3 source materials for the theory test: ‘The Official DVSA Guide to Driving – the essential skills’ (additional purchase required).
• Progress tracking.
• Advanced search tool.
• Voiceover features.

TEST YOURSELF
• Take unlimited quick and timed mock tests. Build a custom practice set or take a timed mock test with 50 questions – just like the real thing. 
• Your progress will also be monitored and visualised in graphs, so you can see how far you’ve come and when you are ready to pass.

STUDY AND PRACTISE
• Read the exclusive study content to increase your knowledge of all theory test topics and test your understanding by answering practice questions (including all official questions, over 770+!).
• You can also select specific question sets from areas you may be struggling with. Got a question wrong? See the correct answer, note the explanation and find out more with references to The Highway Code and other official DVSA guides!

VIDEO CASE STUDIES
• 9 bonus case studies so that you can practise multiple choice questions about a short video clip. 

PROGRESS GAUGE
• Backed by learning science, use the progress gauge to measure your test readiness, providing you with confidence that you’re ready to pass your theory test. 

THE HIGHWAY CODE
• To support your study, we’ve included a free copy of The Official Highway Code to revise from.

EXCLUSIVE CONTENT
• This is the only app to offer ‘The Official DVSA Guide to Driving – the essential skills’, one of the 3 key source materials that the multiple choice questions in the theory test are based on. Study these to learn the rules and skills you’ll be tested on (additional purchase required). 

SEARCH FEATURE
• Do you want to learn about airbags, stopping distances, or yellow lines, or practise questions on road markings? Use our advanced search tool to find the content you need.

ENGLISH VOICEOVER
• If you have reading difficulties (such as dyslexia), or prefer to learn by listening, use our voiceover feature within the test section to support you. 

USEFUL LINKS AND SUPPLIER ZONE
• Navigate through useful resources to support your learning, including the Safe Driving for Life website – a one-stop information resource featuring helpful blogs with lots of tips to help you pass. 
• Passed your test? Use our supplier zone to help you with the next steps in your driving journey. 
• Ready to Pass? links to DVSA’s official resources to help you understand what it takes to be ready for your driving test. Give yourself the best possible chance of passing by learning vital skills, managing your nerves and taking mock tests. 

FEEDBACK
• Let us know what you’d like to see. We’d love to hear from you with any comments or suggestions about this app. 

AWARDS AND RECOGNITION
• Produced by the official publishers of DVSA (TSO).
• Over 4+ million downloads.
• Featured on Apple’s Top Education Apps.
• Nominated for App of the Year (FirstCar).

SUPPORT
• Contact our UK-based team at feedback@williamslea.com  or +44 (0)333 202 5070. We listen and respond to your feedback by updating the app and adding new features.

hk.description:
經典三國單機版

《逐鹿》是一款基於同名歷史沙盤遊戲引擎開發而成的三國題材回合制策略遊戲。在硝煙四起、諸侯爭霸的三國亂世中，玩家可以在劇本中任意選擇勢力，飾演主公。通過內政、外交等玩法助你運籌帷幄。帶領麾下群雄，攻城略地，在遼闊的戰場上開疆擴土。或興復漢室，或成一代梟雄，皆掌握在你的手中。

問鼎九州，逐鹿三國

《逐鹿》的歷史劇本以《三國演義》為藍本推演而來，遊戲貫穿歷史典故，力求還原三國時期的史實風貌。玩家可以任意挑選劇本，並飾演其中一勢力的主公，謀定三國，一統九州。

山河為子，天下為局

《逐鹿》以經典六角戰棋玩法為核心戰鬥模式，玩家可以指揮部隊以「六角戰棋」的形式縱橫馳騁於大戰場之上，或與敵人短兵相接，或以計謀決勝千里之外，在矢石之間，開疆擴土。

堅甲利兵，攻無不克

在遊戲中兵種可分為步兵、騎兵、機械三大類，細分則有弓兵、弩兵、盾兵、輕騎兵等十餘種。還有數十種專屬兵種可以攜帶，出征時根據戰況調配兵種陣容，能夠達到先發制人，克敵機先的效果。

鸞翔鳳集，龍幡虎纛

根據歷史文獻記載以及結合三國演義內容，目前遊戲中已設計武將有600余名。每個武將具有獨特的特性，可以凸顯武將的差異化。不僅如此，我們還為歷史名將繪制了精緻的專屬立繪，彰顯其個性。

hk.releaseNotes:
We’ve been working under the hood to make Controller even smarter and more intuitive – and this update lays important groundwork for the future!

New Features & Improvements
* Smarter Metadata: We’ve introduced a new metadata structure behind the scenes, paving the way for exciting future features.
* Accessory Sorting: You can now sort not only rooms but also individual accessories – making your setup more organized than ever.
* Unique Accessory Names: Controller now helps you automatically avoid duplicate names for devices, keeping things clear and conflict-free.
* Better Naming with Room Prefixes: If you’re using room-based name prefixes, you’ll notice improved handling when moving accessories or renaming rooms.
* Navigate to Rooms Faster: From the accessory details, you can now jump directly to the room view for quicker navigation.

Bug Fixes
* Fixed an issue where some users couldn’t select characteristics when creating service groups.
* Resolved a bug where camera streams failed to load correctly for some users.
* Many smaller improvements under the hood to make the app more stable and reliable.

Update now and enjoy a cleaner, smarter experience with Controller for HomeKit! As always, your feedback helps us make the app even better – thank you!
hk.description:
Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility.

* FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan.
* COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
* NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home.
* BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed.
* SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters.
* WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home.
* SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost.
* MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken.
* LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home.
* WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan.

Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be.

For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com

Privacy Policy: 
https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/

Terms of Use: 
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

hk.description:
這是遊戲創作者繼獲獎作品Kingdom Rush（王國保衛戰）三部曲之後的又一超凡太空奇幻歷險之作。即時，動態以及深度策略的遊戲模式將帶你穿越到不可思議的未知星球。沉浸式擬真遊戲場景，過癮的遊戲玩法，以及超凡絕佳的藝術感和一絲詼諧幽默感帶你進入激烈的戰爭世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的機甲人和強大的外星人通通等你來統率，並肩迎接最強挑戰。

招募和訓練銀河系中最偉大的英雄，率領他們參與幾乎不可能完成的危險任務，發動他們強大的力量和能力。即使是在戰鬥最激烈的時候你也可通過改變自己部隊的角色而進行戰略調整，突擊隊員調整為狙擊兵，火焰噴射器調整為導彈發射器。通過炸彈襲擊，智能地雷，支援部隊，砲塔和各種特種武器轉變戰鬥態勢。

機器人軍隊整裝待發;星際戰艦墜毀了;到處是巨大怪物，未知的種族;所向披靡的攻擊;絕望的營救;無所畏懼地破壞行動正在銀河之中發生......銀河系需要你的統領。

銀河系需要鋼鐵戰隊

遊戲特色

指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。準備好發動英勇的攻擊，堅守陣地，拯救平民，潛入超級計算機和各種英雄的物品。每個任務需要新的戰術和行動才能取得勝利。

通過17次終結式特別行動的戰術規則測試你的機智。每個關卡通過傷痕銘記挑戰。諒你也不敢。

解鎖不可能模式。僅對大無畏敢死隊開放。諒你絕對不敢。

在史詩戰鬥中擊敗巨大而非凡的頭目。這些頭目卑鄙而異常地巨大，他們決心要將你碾碎。鋼鐵戰隊，整裝待發！

40+升級以提升你的戰略，同時授予你的部隊防禦無人機，凝固汽油彈火箭，反彈爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

14位具有出色能力的英雄聽從你的調遣。將他們訓練到極致出色，否則惹惱他們後果自負。

8種可向敵人發動進攻的特種武器，讓你的戰術更加具有深度。還有什麼比得上一個瞄準了的導彈？對50枚高爆炸炸彈的軌道炮襲擊！

完成70+成就中的任何成就，贏得你應得的獎勵

選擇你的遊戲困難模式，找到屬於你的公平挑戰：休閒，普通或老兵別太狂妄了要么狂妄一點你自己決定！！

hk.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

mo.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action roguelite bullet hell inspired by The Binding Of Isaac and Tiny Rogues, where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 100 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with over 10 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 10+ unique characters!​

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over a hundred unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!​

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villian to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours!

Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

mo.releaseNotes:
New! Local Data Health feature in Settings > Storage
Fixes for Object validation in Observations and Observing Lists
Open Cluster radial velocity fixed
mo.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html
經典迷宮遊戲是一款經典的益智遊戲，非常適合在短暫休息時訓練您的大腦。它設計為一款非常簡單的單人遊戲，透過滑過有趣的復古迷宮來玩。快速玩一局，挑戰 500 個迷宮，成為迷宮之王。

mo.releaseNotes:
Questions updated in line with DVSA’s latest Theory Test content, including new questions on Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS). 



The Official DVSA Guide to Driving—the essential skills publication updated, including a new section on ADAS and rewritten section on First aid on the road. 



Functional enhancements and bug fixes.
mo.description:
The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) are the people who set the tests and this app is by their official publisher, The Stationery Office (TSO). It’s regularly updated and covers everything you need to know to pass your theory test, drive safely and improve your road safety awareness! 

Our app is for CAR DRIVERS in Great Britain and Northern Ireland. 

This app can be used offline so that you can practise anytime and anywhere. 

KEY HIGHLIGHTS
• Over 770+  practice theory questions.
• Custom mock tests.
• 36 interactive CGI hazard perception clips.
• Free access to The Highway Code.
• Exclusive access to one of the 3 source materials for the theory test: ‘The Official DVSA Guide to Driving – the essential skills’ (additional purchase required).
• Progress tracking.
• Advanced search tool.
• Voiceover features.

TEST YOURSELF
• Take unlimited quick and timed mock tests. Build a custom practice set or take a timed mock test with 50 questions – just like the real thing. 
• Your progress will also be monitored and visualised in graphs, so you can see how far you’ve come and when you are ready to pass.

STUDY AND PRACTISE
• Read the exclusive study content to increase your knowledge of all theory test topics and test your understanding by answering practice questions (including all official questions, over 770+!).
• You can also select specific question sets from areas you may be struggling with. Got a question wrong? See the correct answer, note the explanation and find out more with references to The Highway Code and other official DVSA guides!

VIDEO CASE STUDIES
• 9 bonus case studies so that you can practise multiple choice questions about a short video clip. 

PROGRESS GAUGE
• Backed by learning science, use the progress gauge to measure your test readiness, providing you with confidence that you’re ready to pass your theory test. 

THE HIGHWAY CODE
• To support your study, we’ve included a free copy of The Official Highway Code to revise from.

EXCLUSIVE CONTENT
• This is the only app to offer ‘The Official DVSA Guide to Driving – the essential skills’, one of the 3 key source materials that the multiple choice questions in the theory test are based on. Study these to learn the rules and skills you’ll be tested on (additional purchase required). 

SEARCH FEATURE
• Do you want to learn about airbags, stopping distances, or yellow lines, or practise questions on road markings? Use our advanced search tool to find the content you need.

ENGLISH VOICEOVER
• If you have reading difficulties (such as dyslexia), or prefer to learn by listening, use our voiceover feature within the test section to support you. 

USEFUL LINKS AND SUPPLIER ZONE
• Navigate through useful resources to support your learning, including the Safe Driving for Life website – a one-stop information resource featuring helpful blogs with lots of tips to help you pass. 
• Passed your test? Use our supplier zone to help you with the next steps in your driving journey. 
• Ready to Pass? links to DVSA’s official resources to help you understand what it takes to be ready for your driving test. Give yourself the best possible chance of passing by learning vital skills, managing your nerves and taking mock tests. 

FEEDBACK
• Let us know what you’d like to see. We’d love to hear from you with any comments or suggestions about this app. 

AWARDS AND RECOGNITION
• Produced by the official publishers of DVSA (TSO).
• Over 4+ million downloads.
• Featured on Apple’s Top Education Apps.
• Nominated for App of the Year (FirstCar).

SUPPORT
• Contact our UK-based team at feedback@williamslea.com  or +44 (0)333 202 5070. We listen and respond to your feedback by updating the app and adding new features.

召集傳說英雄，挑戰無盡關卡！
自動戰鬥、採礦、強化通通都有！
真正的放置型奇幻 RPG，即使離線也能持續成長！

* 組建擁有獨特技能的英雄戰隊，發揮戰略優勢！

* 利用礦坑系統收集資源！打造裝備所需的一切盡在其中！

* 挑戰強大的首領，獲得傳說級獎勵！

* 自動成長系統，讓忙碌的你也能輕鬆遊玩！

* 多樣化內容：地城、遺物、進化、傳說裝備等你來體驗！

立即下載，開始書寫屬於你的傳奇！
馬上開始遊戲，收集你的英雄吧！

2、修復使用自創寶物單挑時可能出現的模型未同步的問題；

馬匹：行軍速度+4（消耗6->5）行軍速度+3（消耗5->4）行軍速度+2（消耗4->3）
寶物：智+6~1（消耗7~2->6~1）統+6~1（消耗7~2->6~1）武+3~1（消耗4~2->3~1）四維屬性+2（消耗6->5）
mo.description:
經典三國單機版

《逐鹿》是一款基於同名歷史沙盤遊戲引擎開發而成的三國題材回合制策略遊戲。在硝煙四起、諸侯爭霸的三國亂世中，玩家可以在劇本中任意選擇勢力，飾演主公。通過內政、外交等玩法助你運籌帷幄。帶領麾下群雄，攻城略地，在遼闊的戰場上開疆擴土。或興復漢室，或成一代梟雄，皆掌握在你的手中。

問鼎九州，逐鹿三國

《逐鹿》的歷史劇本以《三國演義》為藍本推演而來，遊戲貫穿歷史典故，力求還原三國時期的史實風貌。玩家可以任意挑選劇本，並飾演其中一勢力的主公，謀定三國，一統九州。

山河為子，天下為局

《逐鹿》以經典六角戰棋玩法為核心戰鬥模式，玩家可以指揮部隊以「六角戰棋」的形式縱橫馳騁於大戰場之上，或與敵人短兵相接，或以計謀決勝千里之外，在矢石之間，開疆擴土。

堅甲利兵，攻無不克

在遊戲中兵種可分為步兵、騎兵、機械三大類，細分則有弓兵、弩兵、盾兵、輕騎兵等十餘種。還有數十種專屬兵種可以攜帶，出征時根據戰況調配兵種陣容，能夠達到先發制人，克敵機先的效果。

鸞翔鳳集，龍幡虎纛

根據歷史文獻記載以及結合三國演義內容，目前遊戲中已設計武將有600余名。每個武將具有獨特的特性，可以凸顯武將的差異化。不僅如此，我們還為歷史名將繪制了精緻的專屬立繪，彰顯其個性。

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
mo.description:
這是遊戲創作者繼獲獎作品Kingdom Rush（王國保衛戰）三部曲之後的又一超凡太空奇幻歷險之作。即時，動態以及深度策略的遊戲模式將帶你穿越到不可思議的未知星球。沉浸式擬真遊戲場景，過癮的遊戲玩法，以及超凡絕佳的藝術感和一絲詼諧幽默感帶你進入激烈的戰爭世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的機甲人和強大的外星人通通等你來統率，並肩迎接最強挑戰。

招募和訓練銀河系中最偉大的英雄，率領他們參與幾乎不可能完成的危險任務，發動他們強大的力量和能力。即使是在戰鬥最激烈的時候你也可通過改變自己部隊的角色而進行戰略調整，突擊隊員調整為狙擊兵，火焰噴射器調整為導彈發射器。通過炸彈襲擊，智能地雷，支援部隊，砲塔和各種特種武器轉變戰鬥態勢。

機器人軍隊整裝待發;星際戰艦墜毀了;到處是巨大怪物，未知的種族;所向披靡的攻擊;絕望的營救;無所畏懼地破壞行動正在銀河之中發生......銀河系需要你的統領。

銀河系需要鋼鐵戰隊

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over a hundred unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!​

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villian to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours!

Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

tw.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

tw.description:
The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) are the people who set the tests and this app is by their official publisher, The Stationery Office (TSO). It’s regularly updated and covers everything you need to know to pass your theory test, drive safely and improve your road safety awareness! 

Our app is for CAR DRIVERS in Great Britain and Northern Ireland. 

This app can be used offline so that you can practise anytime and anywhere. 

KEY HIGHLIGHTS
• Over 770+  practice theory questions.
• Custom mock tests.
• 36 interactive CGI hazard perception clips.
• Free access to The Highway Code.
• Exclusive access to one of the 3 source materials for the theory test: ‘The Official DVSA Guide to Driving – the essential skills’ (additional purchase required).
• Progress tracking.
• Advanced search tool.
• Voiceover features.

TEST YOURSELF
• Take unlimited quick and timed mock tests. Build a custom practice set or take a timed mock test with 50 questions – just like the real thing. 
• Your progress will also be monitored and visualised in graphs, so you can see how far you’ve come and when you are ready to pass.

STUDY AND PRACTISE
• Read the exclusive study content to increase your knowledge of all theory test topics and test your understanding by answering practice questions (including all official questions, over 770+!).
• You can also select specific question sets from areas you may be struggling with. Got a question wrong? See the correct answer, note the explanation and find out more with references to The Highway Code and other official DVSA guides!

VIDEO CASE STUDIES
• 9 bonus case studies so that you can practise multiple choice questions about a short video clip. 

PROGRESS GAUGE
• Backed by learning science, use the progress gauge to measure your test readiness, providing you with confidence that you’re ready to pass your theory test. 

THE HIGHWAY CODE
• To support your study, we’ve included a free copy of The Official Highway Code to revise from.

EXCLUSIVE CONTENT
• This is the only app to offer ‘The Official DVSA Guide to Driving – the essential skills’, one of the 3 key source materials that the multiple choice questions in the theory test are based on. Study these to learn the rules and skills you’ll be tested on (additional purchase required). 

SEARCH FEATURE
• Do you want to learn about airbags, stopping distances, or yellow lines, or practise questions on road markings? Use our advanced search tool to find the content you need.

ENGLISH VOICEOVER
• If you have reading difficulties (such as dyslexia), or prefer to learn by listening, use our voiceover feature within the test section to support you. 

USEFUL LINKS AND SUPPLIER ZONE
• Navigate through useful resources to support your learning, including the Safe Driving for Life website – a one-stop information resource featuring helpful blogs with lots of tips to help you pass. 
• Passed your test? Use our supplier zone to help you with the next steps in your driving journey. 
• Ready to Pass? links to DVSA’s official resources to help you understand what it takes to be ready for your driving test. Give yourself the best possible chance of passing by learning vital skills, managing your nerves and taking mock tests. 

FEEDBACK
• Let us know what you’d like to see. We’d love to hear from you with any comments or suggestions about this app. 

AWARDS AND RECOGNITION
• Produced by the official publishers of DVSA (TSO).
• Over 4+ million downloads.
• Featured on Apple’s Top Education Apps.
• Nominated for App of the Year (FirstCar).

SUPPORT
• Contact our UK-based team at feedback@williamslea.com  or +44 (0)333 202 5070. We listen and respond to your feedback by updating the app and adding new features.

tw.description:
1985年，一場無法挽回的災難降臨——核戰爭和致命病毒的爆發導致了世界末日，將整個世界變成了一片巨大的放射性荒原，充斥著突變體、掠奪者和瘋子（他們比任何僵尸都可怕）。蘇聯在核打擊中崩潰，整個世界變成了一個每個人都在為生存而戰的競技場。

在一個充滿輻射和怪物的世界中生存並不容易。如今，在昔日世界的廢墟上，暴力、飢餓和疾病統治著一切。作為一名幸存者，你必須在這個對生命充滿敵意的開放世界中適應環境，並尋找和拯救你的家人——也許他們在這場混亂中幸存了下來？……

危險與冒險在每一個轉角等著你。作為一名潛行者，你需要在輻射水平比切爾諾貝利災難還要高數倍的廢棄城市中搜尋物資，並在充滿嗜血突變體和僵尸瘋子的森林中穿行。在這片混亂與廢墟中，你必須運用所有的生存技能，獨自為生命而戰！

《Day R Survival》不僅僅是一款游戲，而是一款真實的核末日生存模擬游戲，背景設定在1985年蘇聯的廣闊而真實的地圖上。

《Day R Survival》的RPG和任務系統是一款硬核的生存模擬RPG。核戰爭和致命病毒（比任何僵尸病毒都可怕）不僅會給你帶來強大而狡猾的敵人，還會讓你面臨艱難的選擇。游戲中的任務充滿了陰暗的氛圍和絕望，人們不得不在昔日世界的廢墟上掙扎求生。


廣闊的開放世界
在1985年蘇聯的逼真地圖上，探索超過2700個廢棄城市。這些城市充滿了資源、危險（如突變體、野生動物和瘋狂的僵尸）以及未解之謎。你可以在森林中狩獵，在河流中釣魚，或是掠奪資源——在這個世界裡，你的生存策略沒有任何限制！

物品制作
數百種真實的制作配方：從日常用品到頂級軍用交通工具和彈藥。你擁有機械、化學、物理或生存方面的知識嗎？現在是時候運用它們了！

在殘酷世界中掙扎求生
你隻是一個普通人，需要食物、水和休息。你會染上疾病，傷口也不會自行愈合。尋找食物，爭奪每一滴干淨的水，建造避難所，並時刻保持警惕——在這個世界上，哪怕是一隻老鼠，都可能要了你的命！


單人模式與多人聯機
你可以獨自挑戰任務，也可以與朋友並肩作戰——隨時在單人和多人模式之間切換，選擇最適合你的生存方式。打造獨特的生存策略，或與志同道合的玩家聯手，通過聊天交流、交易物資，並在末世荒原中共同完成任務，尋找生存的希望。


游戲特色  
在線與離線模式
多人在線生存，與好友組隊挑戰末世危機
難度選擇：簡單、普通、困難，適應不同生存策略
技能成長與強化
動態環境：四季更迭、晝夜交替、輻射水平不斷變化
敵人與資源隨機刷新
逼真廢土氛圍，沉浸式核戰后世界生存挑戰


幸存者！體驗最真實的生存模擬游戲之一——Day R Survival。制定你的生存策略，揭開末日世界的重重謎團，努力活下去！

tw.description:
經典三國單機版

《逐鹿》是一款基於同名歷史沙盤遊戲引擎開發而成的三國題材回合制策略遊戲。在硝煙四起、諸侯爭霸的三國亂世中，玩家可以在劇本中任意選擇勢力，飾演主公。通過內政、外交等玩法助你運籌帷幄。帶領麾下群雄，攻城略地，在遼闊的戰場上開疆擴土。或興復漢室，或成一代梟雄，皆掌握在你的手中。

問鼎九州，逐鹿三國

《逐鹿》的歷史劇本以《三國演義》為藍本推演而來，遊戲貫穿歷史典故，力求還原三國時期的史實風貌。玩家可以任意挑選劇本，並飾演其中一勢力的主公，謀定三國，一統九州。

山河為子，天下為局

《逐鹿》以經典六角戰棋玩法為核心戰鬥模式，玩家可以指揮部隊以「六角戰棋」的形式縱橫馳騁於大戰場之上，或與敵人短兵相接，或以計謀決勝千里之外，在矢石之間，開疆擴土。

堅甲利兵，攻無不克

在遊戲中兵種可分為步兵、騎兵、機械三大類，細分則有弓兵、弩兵、盾兵、輕騎兵等十餘種。還有數十種專屬兵種可以攜帶，出征時根據戰況調配兵種陣容，能夠達到先發制人，克敵機先的效果。

鸞翔鳳集，龍幡虎纛

根據歷史文獻記載以及結合三國演義內容，目前遊戲中已設計武將有600余名。每個武將具有獨特的特性，可以凸顯武將的差異化。不僅如此，我們還為歷史名將繪制了精緻的專屬立繪，彰顯其個性。

tw.description:
**Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app for 7 years running**

97% of learners pass their Theory Test using nothing more than this 4 in 1 AWARD-WINNING app*! Revise with full confidence knowing you have EVERYTHING you need to pass your 2025 Theory Test first time, getting you 1 step closer to your full DVLA licence, or we’ll give you your test fee back if you fail.

Join the 18 MILLION+ learner drivers we’ve helped prepare for their driving theory test.

Suitable for:
• Car Drivers in GB & NI
• Motorcyclists in GB & NI
• Trainee ADI's in GB & NI
• HGV/LGV & PCV Drivers preparing to take Module 1a and 1b Tests in GB & NI

DRIVING THEORY TEST 2025
Practise the latest Theory Test revision questions, answers and explanations, licensed directly from the DVSA (the people who set the official test). No other Theory Test app contains more revision questions!

Sit UNLIMITED timed mock tests including the NEW DVSA video case studies. Car drivers can practise multiple-choice questions based on a short video...just like the real test.

Keep a daily track of your progress so you know when you’re ready to sit the official Theory Test!

FREE PASS GUARANTEE
We’re so confident that our app will help you pass your Driving Theory Test, we will give you your £23 test fee back if you fail after completing the revision plan in full. Available for learner car drivers and motorcyclists only. T&C’s apply**.

LEARNER PLAN
Struggling to know where to start with your Theory Test revision? Our structured Learner Plan ensures you a first time pass, guiding you through your revision from start to finish.

LEADERBOARD
Rev up your revision with our NEW weekly Leaderboard! Earn points for acing practice quizzes, passing Mock Tests and more. Revise for a prize as you make the most of your study sessions.

SMART AI MODE
Want a more tailored approach to revision? Smart AI Mode makes revising for your theory test more efficient and tracks your progress to help you concentrate on the areas where you need the most support.

VOICEOVER
English voiceover available for all Driving Theory Test revision questions PLUS The Highway Code...ideal for users with reading difficulties or dyslexia.

HAZARD PERCEPTION TEST
85 interactive video clips, including all 34 DVSA CGI clips covering bad weather and night time driving, with built-in cheat detection just like in the official test.

THE HIGHWAY CODE 2025 Edition
Revise and refresh your knowledge of the latest UK Highway Code. Includes English voiceover.

ROAD SIGNS 2025
Learn ALL the UK road signs with over 1,500 photos and descriptions.

Optional LEARN TO DRIVE PRACTICAL CAR DRIVING CONTENT
Includes:
• 3 day trial access to over 250 virtual Practical Driving Lesson videos, to help you learn and understand the routines and manoeuvres that you could be asked to perform on your Driving Test
• The top 10 reasons for failing
• Learn how to banish test nerves and anxiety
• A full mock driving test with examiner debrief
• All the latest DVSA help and advice on the 'Ready to Pass?' campaign
Helping you get one step closer to your full DVLA licence

EXCLUSIVE BONUS CONTENT
Access to exclusive offers and discounts!

AWARDS:
• Named Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app of 2024, 2023, 2022, 2021, 2020, 2019 & 2018
• As featured on the Gadget Show
• Intelligent Instructor Product of the Year 2022, 2023 & 2024
• App of the Year, FirstCar Awards 2021 & 2019
• Winner of the Auto Express Theory Test App
• DIA Driver and Rider Training Awards "Product of the Year"

CONTACT US: support@drivingtestsuccess.com

tw.description:
這是遊戲創作者繼獲獎作品Kingdom Rush（王國保衛戰）三部曲之後的又一超凡太空奇幻歷險之作。即時，動態以及深度策略的遊戲模式將帶你穿越到不可思議的未知星球。沉浸式擬真遊戲場景，過癮的遊戲玩法，以及超凡絕佳的藝術感和一絲詼諧幽默感帶你進入激烈的戰爭世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的機甲人和強大的外星人通通等你來統率，並肩迎接最強挑戰。

招募和訓練銀河系中最偉大的英雄，率領他們參與幾乎不可能完成的危險任務，發動他們強大的力量和能力。即使是在戰鬥最激烈的時候你也可通過改變自己部隊的角色而進行戰略調整，突擊隊員調整為狙擊兵，火焰噴射器調整為導彈發射器。通過炸彈襲擊，智能地雷，支援部隊，砲塔和各種特種武器轉變戰鬥態勢。

機器人軍隊整裝待發;星際戰艦墜毀了;到處是巨大怪物，未知的種族;所向披靡的攻擊;絕望的營救;無所畏懼地破壞行動正在銀河之中發生......銀河系需要你的統領。

銀河系需要鋼鐵戰隊

遊戲特色

指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。準備好發動英勇的攻擊，堅守陣地，拯救平民，潛入超級計算機和各種英雄的物品。每個任務需要新的戰術和行動才能取得勝利。

通過17次終結式特別行動的戰術規則測試你的機智。每個關卡通過傷痕銘記挑戰。諒你也不敢。

解鎖不可能模式。僅對大無畏敢死隊開放。諒你絕對不敢。

在史詩戰鬥中擊敗巨大而非凡的頭目。這些頭目卑鄙而異常地巨大，他們決心要將你碾碎。鋼鐵戰隊，整裝待發！

40+升級以提升你的戰略，同時授予你的部隊防禦無人機，凝固汽油彈火箭，反彈爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

14位具有出色能力的英雄聽從你的調遣。將他們訓練到極致出色，否則惹惱他們後果自負。

8種可向敵人發動進攻的特種武器，讓你的戰術更加具有深度。還有什麼比得上一個瞄準了的導彈？對50枚高爆炸炸彈的軌道炮襲擊！

完成70+成就中的任何成就，贏得你應得的獎勵

tw.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

us.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action roguelite bullet hell inspired by The Binding Of Isaac and Tiny Rogues, where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 100 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with over 10 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 10+ unique characters!​

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over a hundred unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!​

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villian to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours!

Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

us.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

us.description:
In a land far, far away there once was a vast continent called Milton. It was a land where the power of rule came by the sword and the arcane, where Men who devoted themselves to the blade or to magecraft, could become the finest warriors, wisest wizards or the greatest adventurers. In this land, there are several kingdoms divided by borders but united through history. Countless stories of alliances, upheaval, and moments of peace bedeck this tapestry, but that is a tale for another day. 

Our story begins in a remote kingdom to the north, Iblis, an obscure and oft-forgotten place. It is a wild and barren land, a place where its people scrape a living from the earth, mining minerals for the lords of the south. On occasion, adventurers would stop by for the night but never linger. Until one day, a fledgling adventurer lost his way and stumbled into a hole. The story might have ended then had he not come back, but return he did, with sacks of gold and glittering treasure. 

Like a fierce gale from the north, news of his fame and fortune fanned across the kingdoms overnight, and kings sent their bravest warriors and adventurers to clear the cavern of monsters in search of treasure. Even peasants wanting a part of this newfound wealth partook in these expeditions. In no time at all, a bustling town had sprung up in this forgotten place. People set up camps, and formed their own groups to explore the cave. Clever merchants not missing this opportunity, built taverns and shops near the cave, selling equipment and potions to eager adventurers. At first, everything seemed fine. As explorers delved into the caves, they encountered new creatures and discovered new treasures. Mysteries continued to pour forth from the cave, yet nobody knew where the source of the secrets lay. However, as the explorations continued, the balance of wealth beyond the cave began to waver, and cracks appeared among those adventurers who had previously worked arm-in-arm. The latecomers or weak, limited to wandering the upper levels of the cave, could only watch as the veteran adventurers brought treasure after treasure from the deep. They began harboring dark thoughts as they watched the veteran adventurers grow arrogant from their largesse, ordering people around, hoarding secrets from the rest. The place became a festering pool of suspicions and greed, mired in a jealous rage. 

It started with an adventurer disappearing in the cave. Rumors circulated he had found some legendary treasure and hoarded it for himself. Others said he had been guided to another world by some mysterious magic force in the cave. Still, the unspoken belief was that he had been murdered by a rival party and was buried somewhere beneath the caverns. Nobody knows exactly what happened, but people have continued to disappear ever since. As more people have gone missing, some adventurers have called it quits, others cling to hope, and a few continue to wait and see. Which brings us to you, an ordinary young man, coming into this extraordinary circumstance with purposes unknown to others. May you find what you seek in ...

--------------------------------------------------------
In " The Greedy Cave", you are a brave adventurer tasked with exploring a mysterious cave and battling all kinds of monsters.

Use your wits to defeat them, learn different skills, gain mighty equipment, challenge evil monster bosses, and decipher the mystery surrounding this cave...

Game Features
·Randomly generated cave levels provide a different game experience every time!                     
·Hundreds of monsters to defeat!
·Hundreds of equipment to collect!
·Hundreds of quests and achievements to conquer!
·Enchant/Reform/Level up/Gold collecting, and more abundant systems to explore!

Contact us
cs.thegreedycave@avalongames.com
https://www.facebook.com/greedycave/

Ever wish your notes could do more? With Goodnotes 6, they can! Step into the future of note-taking with Goodnotes 6, the best AI notebook for iPad. Write notes, convert handwriting to text, annotate PDFs, and use AI tools for study and productivity. 

Boost Professional Efficiency and Productivity
• Use Ask Goodnotes to summarize, translate, and extract key insights from your notes, PDFs, and documents—perfect for your next important meeting.
• Import, annotate, and organize PDFs, documents, and meeting notes.
• Transcribe audio recordings from meetings so you never miss a detail.
• Present like a pro, with a built-in laser pointer that is perfect for meetings and presentations.

• Send files directly to your unique Goodnotes email for quick access on all devices.

Powerful Digital Notes and Study Tools

us.description:
The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) are the people who set the tests and this app is by their official publisher, The Stationery Office (TSO). It’s regularly updated and covers everything you need to know to pass your theory test, drive safely and improve your road safety awareness! 

Our app is for CAR DRIVERS in Great Britain and Northern Ireland. 

This app can be used offline so that you can practise anytime and anywhere. 

KEY HIGHLIGHTS
• Over 770+  practice theory questions.
• Custom mock tests.
• 36 interactive CGI hazard perception clips.
• Free access to The Highway Code.
• Exclusive access to one of the 3 source materials for the theory test: ‘The Official DVSA Guide to Driving – the essential skills’ (additional purchase required).
• Progress tracking.
• Advanced search tool.
• Voiceover features.

TEST YOURSELF
• Take unlimited quick and timed mock tests. Build a custom practice set or take a timed mock test with 50 questions – just like the real thing. 
• Your progress will also be monitored and visualised in graphs, so you can see how far you’ve come and when you are ready to pass.

STUDY AND PRACTISE
• Read the exclusive study content to increase your knowledge of all theory test topics and test your understanding by answering practice questions (including all official questions, over 770+!).
• You can also select specific question sets from areas you may be struggling with. Got a question wrong? See the correct answer, note the explanation and find out more with references to The Highway Code and other official DVSA guides!

VIDEO CASE STUDIES
• 9 bonus case studies so that you can practise multiple choice questions about a short video clip. 

PROGRESS GAUGE
• Backed by learning science, use the progress gauge to measure your test readiness, providing you with confidence that you’re ready to pass your theory test. 

THE HIGHWAY CODE
• To support your study, we’ve included a free copy of The Official Highway Code to revise from.

EXCLUSIVE CONTENT
• This is the only app to offer ‘The Official DVSA Guide to Driving – the essential skills’, one of the 3 key source materials that the multiple choice questions in the theory test are based on. Study these to learn the rules and skills you’ll be tested on (additional purchase required). 

SEARCH FEATURE
• Do you want to learn about airbags, stopping distances, or yellow lines, or practise questions on road markings? Use our advanced search tool to find the content you need.

ENGLISH VOICEOVER
• If you have reading difficulties (such as dyslexia), or prefer to learn by listening, use our voiceover feature within the test section to support you. 

USEFUL LINKS AND SUPPLIER ZONE
• Navigate through useful resources to support your learning, including the Safe Driving for Life website – a one-stop information resource featuring helpful blogs with lots of tips to help you pass. 
• Passed your test? Use our supplier zone to help you with the next steps in your driving journey. 
• Ready to Pass? links to DVSA’s official resources to help you understand what it takes to be ready for your driving test. Give yourself the best possible chance of passing by learning vital skills, managing your nerves and taking mock tests. 

FEEDBACK
• Let us know what you’d like to see. We’d love to hear from you with any comments or suggestions about this app. 

AWARDS AND RECOGNITION
• Produced by the official publishers of DVSA (TSO).
• Over 4+ million downloads.
• Featured on Apple’s Top Education Apps.
• Nominated for App of the Year (FirstCar).

SUPPORT
• Contact our UK-based team at feedback@williamslea.com  or +44 (0)333 202 5070. We listen and respond to your feedback by updating the app and adding new features.

us.description:
經典三國單機版

《逐鹿》是一款基於同名歷史沙盤遊戲引擎開發而成的三國題材回合制策略遊戲。在硝煙四起、諸侯爭霸的三國亂世中，玩家可以在劇本中任意選擇勢力，飾演主公。通過內政、外交等玩法助你運籌帷幄。帶領麾下群雄，攻城略地，在遼闊的戰場上開疆擴土。或興復漢室，或成一代梟雄，皆掌握在你的手中。

問鼎九州，逐鹿三國

《逐鹿》的歷史劇本以《三國演義》為藍本推演而來，遊戲貫穿歷史典故，力求還原三國時期的史實風貌。玩家可以任意挑選劇本，並飾演其中一勢力的主公，謀定三國，一統九州。

山河為子，天下為局

《逐鹿》以經典六角戰棋玩法為核心戰鬥模式，玩家可以指揮部隊以「六角戰棋」的形式縱橫馳騁於大戰場之上，或與敵人短兵相接，或以計謀決勝千里之外，在矢石之間，開疆擴土。

堅甲利兵，攻無不克

在遊戲中兵種可分為步兵、騎兵、機械三大類，細分則有弓兵、弩兵、盾兵、輕騎兵等十餘種。還有數十種專屬兵種可以攜帶，出征時根據戰況調配兵種陣容，能夠達到先發制人，克敵機先的效果。

鸞翔鳳集，龍幡虎纛

根據歷史文獻記載以及結合三國演義內容，目前遊戲中已設計武將有600余名。每個武將具有獨特的特性，可以凸顯武將的差異化。不僅如此，我們還為歷史名將繪制了精緻的專屬立繪，彰顯其個性。

The new game of the developer ""GameCoaster"", who made Dungeon Maker and Dungeon Defense!

A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss.
Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory.
Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss.

You are tasked with infiltrating a planet dominated by light all on your own.
You must bring down the heroes and use them to summon monsters to fight alongside you,
armed with the equipment of these fallen sacrifices.

Once you are strong enough, you may receive the blessings of the Dark Gods,
and combine their powers with those of your monsters to bring down colossal groups of enemies.

◇ 10 elite monsters and over 100 unique skills

us.description:
Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now!

Voted "Best Digital Board Game” in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021
Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide

Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It’s a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don’t. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts!

Features

The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life.
• A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams
• *NEW*  VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat
• AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions
• 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese
• SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI
• ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game
• PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience

How to play

CUSTOMISE your character
Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own.

SPIN THE SPINNER
The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose?

It’s your LIFE PATH
Get married or don’t, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours!

More WAYS TO WIN
Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid.

RETIRE your way
Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on!

Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items
Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards!

In-game Video Chat
Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It’s super easy to set-up and play:

• Create your free private account
• Invite your friends and family to chat groups
• Start games straight from those chats
• Play face-to-face wherever you are

It’s simple, seamless fun for everyone.

The Ultimate Life Collection
Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

us.description:
Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together.

Benefits of Premium version:
- Unique pet Raven
- Starter Kit
- Caches of useful items in shelters
- Expanded selection of perks
- Chat without any limitations
- Reduced waiting time between parcels
- Access to all kinds and colors of map markers

Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. 

It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies – you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. 

- Hardcore survival:
Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax.

- Realistic world:
The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness!

- A lot of opportunities:
Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition.

- People and stories:
Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world.

- Improve your skills:
Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others.

- Cooperative mode:
The Online mode  with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game.

Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials.
Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! 

Features: 
- Сraft system – get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! 
- Hardcore simulator of survival 
- Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode 
- Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online
War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other.

User agreement: http://tltgames.ru/license-agreement-en
